text: Worrying that I m not worth enough to friends for them to put up with me In my house recently  the two more assertive people have suggested  read  basically forced  the idea of having a bucket for every person s washing up and thus everyone just does their own stuff  while trusting everyone to wash anything communal as well as the kitchen itself after they use it  It worries me because I ve tried so hard to improve my diet and if people leave stuff and claim they didn t do it  I won t be able to clean someone else s mess  cook  then clean again  I don t have the energy most of the time   They won t listen to me though  They insist it ll be fine  but they re the worst people for not cleaning up after themselves  I had to stand up for myself  and now I m crying and stupid as it sounds  I feel like hurting myself more than I have for a long time  I ve never self harmed before  but if I had a knife nearby I feel like I would ve done it  I just feel like I m not worth enough to them to make simple changes so that I can eat properly  They kept acting like they didn t even know me  didn t even know how much depression drains me  This all comes at a really stressful time too  Dwp meetings comin  up  another load of people who constantly try to act like my disabilities and illnesses don t exist  bunch of terrifying paperwork to do for resigning my rent contract   I don t know what to do  It s the middle of the night here  Nobody but those two are awake  I can t go anywhere and I m scared that I m gonna hurt myself and I know no one cares
summary: In my house two assertive people have suggested that everyone should have a bucket for washing up and everyone should do their own stuff. text: What if i dont care I have a question  let me give some context  I can think of  and have heard of billion logical reasons why I shouldn t commit suicide  Think of your family  your friends  your teachers  I know  I know  but I don t care  Even according to my own beliefs  which I view as more important than anything else in the whole of reality  I believe suicide is wrong  immoral and illogical  but I don t care  I know I ll be missing out on all the happy things  and a chance at a fulfilling life  all the possible good but I don t care  Cognitively I understand that I shouldn t kill myself  that I should keep living  but to me life isn t worth it  I don t enjoy any of it  Every single moment is at the least discomfort  I am never satisfied or even content  And at the worst  I am screaming in my mind because the pain is pure agony  I don t enjoy analyzing data so why would I pursue it as a career  Same with life  I don t enjoy life so I don t want to continue it  To some extent I can oppose my emotions to obey logic  but not all the time  not forever  not life  We as humans need emotions to motivate us  We can t do anything continually if we lack the emotion  the care  the motivation to do it  This is why I can t continue living when I don t care  What should I do  and how when I don t have the motivation to do it  How do I do anything  including what will help me in my illness  if I don t care  Help
summary: Suicide is wrong immoral and illogical but I don't care. I understand that I shouldn't kill myself, but to me life isn't worth it. I am never satisfied or content in any moment of my life. I can't do anything if I lack the motivation to do it.

text: TLDR sequelOkay I ve just sat my exams  and honestly I am praying to God and anyone else who can hear me that I pass And if I don t  well  I ve changed my mind a lot since the last post I made  I m not going to kill myself I don t want to die  just yet anyway If I pass then that s all well and good and I can delete this account  But if I don t  then I have another plan  I ll continue working in my part time job and hopefully progress to full time work  I ll never get a good paying job without college qualifications  not in this country at least  but I have a plan It s legal  but fairly morally grey  My family would disown my here and now if I told them what it was I ll have to give up on my dream of becoming a teacher if I go down this route  and I ll never be really happy  as this route  maybe  involves getting married and just living out however long this planet has left  as a housewife   I m cringing at the thought even now But yeah  I m not giving up on life itself  There s enough sadness in the world without me adding to it And if anyone does decide to read this  first off congrats on getting this far  and second  don t give up  get help  however you can  professionals  friends  family  heck even a stranger on the street  and just find something worth living for  Even if it s a pet goldfish or something Good luck
summary: If she doesn't pass her exams, she will continue working in her part-time job and eventually progress to full-time work. If she does pass, her family would disown her and she would have to give up her dream of becoming a teacher.
cleaned: not pass exam continue work time job eventually progress time work pass family disown dream teacher
